com.paymill.services
Class RefundService

java.lang.Object
  com.paymill.services.RefundService

public class RefundService
extends Object

The RefundService is used to list and create PAYMILL Refunds.

Since:
3.0.0
Author:
Vassil Nikolov

Method Detail

list

public PaymillList<Refund> list()
This function returns a List of PAYMILL Refund objects.

Returns:
PaymillList which contains a List of PAYMILL Refunds and their total count.

list

public PaymillList<Refund> list(Integer count,
                                Integer offset)
This function returns a List of PAYMILL Refund objects, overriding the default count and offset.

Parameters:
count - Max Integer of returned objects in the PaymillList
offset - Integer to start from.
Returns:
PaymillList which contains a List of PAYMILL Refunds and their total count.

list

public PaymillList<Refund> list(Refund.Filter filter,
                                Refund.Order order)
This function returns a List of PAYMILL Refund objects. In which order this list is returned depends on the optional parameters. If null is given, no filter or order will be applied.

Parameters:
filter - Refund.Filter or null
order - Refund.Order or null
Returns:
PaymillList which contains a List of PAYMILL Refunds and their total count.

list

public PaymillList<Refund> list(Refund.Filter filter,
                                Refund.Order order,
                                Integer count,
                                Integer offset)
This function returns a List of PAYMILL Refund objects. In which order this list is returned depends on the optional parameters. If null is given, no filter or order will be applied, overriding the default count and offset.

Parameters:
filter - Refund.Filter or null
order - Refund.Order or null
count - Max Integer of returned objects in the PaymillList
offset - Integer to start from.
Returns:
PaymillList which contains a List of PAYMILL Refunds and their total count.

get

public Refund get(Refund refund)
Returns and refresh detailed informations of a specific Refund.

Parameters:
refund - A Refund with Id.
Returns:
Refreshed instance of the given Refund.

get

public Refund get(String refundId)
Returns and refresh detailed informations of a specific Refund.

Parameters:
refundId - Id of the Refund
Returns:
Refreshed instance of the given Refund.

refundTransaction

public Refund refundTransaction(Transaction transaction,
                                Integer amount)
This function refunds a Transaction that has been created previously and was refunded in parts or wasn't refunded at all. The inserted amount will be refunded to the credit card / direct debit of the original Transaction. There will be some fees for the merchant for every refund.

Note:
  • You can refund parts of a transaction until the transaction amount is fully refunded. But be careful there will be a fee for every refund
  • There is no need to define a currency for refunds, because they will be in the same currency as the original transaction

Parameters:
transaction - The Transaction, which will be refunded.
amount - Amount (in cents) which will be charged
Returns:
A Refund for the given Transaction.

refundTransaction

public Refund refundTransaction(String transactionId,
                                Integer amount)
This function refunds a Transaction that has been created previously and was refunded in parts or wasn't refunded at all. The inserted amount will be refunded to the credit card / direct debit of the original Transaction. There will be some fees for the merchant for every refund.

Note:
  • You can refund parts of a transaction until the transaction amount is fully refunded. But be careful there will be a fee for every refund
  • There is no need to define a currency for refunds, because they will be in the same currency as the original transaction

Parameters:
transactionId - Id of Transaction, which will be refunded.
amount - Amount (in cents) which will be charged.
Returns:
A Refund for the given Transaction.

refundTransaction

public Refund refundTransaction(String transactionId,
                                Integer amount,
                                String description)
This function refunds a Transaction that has been created previously and was refunded in parts or wasn't refunded at all. The inserted amount will be refunded to the credit card / direct debit of the original Transaction. There will be some fees for the merchant for every refund.

Note:
  • You can refund parts of a transaction until the transaction amount is fully refunded. But be careful there will be a fee for every refund
  • There is no need to define a currency for refunds, because they will be in the same currency as the original transaction

Parameters:
transactionId - Id of Transaction, which will be refunded.
amount - Amount (in cents) which will be charged.
description - Additional description for this refund.
Returns:
A Refund for the given Transaction.

refundTransaction

public Refund refundTransaction(Transaction transaction,
                                Integer amount,
                                String description)
This function refunds a Transaction that has been created previously and was refunded in parts or wasn't refunded at all. The inserted amount will be refunded to the credit card / direct debit of the original Transaction. There will be some fees for the merchant for every refund.

Note:
  • You can refund parts of a transaction until the transaction amount is fully refunded. But be careful there will be a fee for every refund
  • There is no need to define a currency for refunds, because they will be in the same currency as the original transaction

Parameters:
transaction - The Transaction, which will be refunded.
amount - Amount (in cents) which will be charged.
description - Additional description for this refund.
Returns:
A Refund for the given Transaction.
